summary: Email correspondence regarding the purchase and installation timeline of a camera system at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, specifically referencing the Epstein incident of August 10, 2019. The exchange involves a Facilities Manager, a Federal Sales Representative, and an SSA from the DOJ OIG seeking documentation on when the system arrived and was installed.

keyFacts: A new camera system was installed at the MCC New York the week of August 16, 2019, immediately following the Epstein incident on August 10, 2019.
The camera system was ordered on September 27, 2018, and estimated to have been delivered to the MCC around October 14, 2018, but not installed until nearly a year later in August 2019.
The DOJ OIG is actively investigating the timeline of the camera system's arrival and installation in relation to the Epstein incident.
